        Parameters:

      • getNextPrev

        public com.bounswe.group7.model.NextPrevTopic getNextPrev(Long id)
        This method takes an id of a topic and finds the previous and next topic on the topic pack. OrderBy is used to sort the topic pack.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the topic.
        Returns:
        returns NextPrevTopic if there is a previous topic it returns it, otherwise null. Same for next.

      • getTopicPack

        public com.bounswe.group7.model.TopicPacks getTopicPack(Long id)
        This method returns the topic pack
        Parameters:
        id - id of the topic pack
        Returns:
        returns the Topic pack object.

      • getTopicsOfTopicPack

        This method returns the topics of a topic pack.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns a list of the topics of topic pack

      • createTopic

        public com.bounswe.group7.model.Topics createTopic(com.bounswe.group7.model.Topics topic)
        this takes a topic object and creates the topic. It sets the userId, rate as zero, rate counter as zero If there is no topic pack given, it is created.
        Parameters:
        topic - the object that holds the header, material description, tags.
        Returns:
        returns the created topic.

      • createTopicPack

        public com.bounswe.group7.model.TopicPacks createTopicPack(com.bounswe.group7.model.TopicPacks topicPack)
        This method creates a topic pack. It gives userId, date.
        Parameters:
        topicPack - topic pack that holds id.
        Returns:
        returns the created topic pack.

      • createTopicPackByName

        public com.bounswe.group7.model.TopicPacks createTopicPackByName(String name)
        This method creates a topic pack by name
        Parameters:
        name - name of the topic pack
        Returns:
        returns the created topic pack.

        This method returns the most rated 10 topics.
        Returns:
        returns the most rated topic list

      • rateTopic

        public boolean rateTopic(com.bounswe.group7.model.RatedTopics ratedTopic)
        This method takes a RatedTopics object and rates the topic. If the user never rated, it is added to calculation. If the user rated before and vote changed, previous vote is taken back and calculations made for the new vote. If the user rated before and the vote is the same, fails
        Parameters:
        ratedTopic - the object that holds topic id and vote.
        Returns:
        returns true if succeed. false otherwise.

      • getUserFollowedTopics

        public List<com.bounswe.group7.model.Topics> getUserFollowedTopics()
        this method returns the followed topics of the user
        Returns:
        returns the list of topics

      • getTopicFollowers

        public List<com.bounswe.group7.model.Users> getTopicFollowers(Long topicId)
        this method returns the users that followed a topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic id
        Returns:
        returns the users list that following the topic

      • followTopic

        public boolean followTopic(Long topicId)
        This method follows a topic if it is un-followed, un-follows it if it followed.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic to be followed
        Returns:
        returns true if it can follow, false otherwise.

      • unfollowTopic

        public boolean unfollowTopic(Long topicId)
        This method un-follows a topic
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic id to be followed
        Returns:
        returns true if can be un-followed

      • checkFollowedTopic

        public boolean checkFollowedTopic(Long topicId)
        This method returns that a topic is followed or not.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic to be checked
        Returns:
        returns true if followed, false if un followed.

      • getTopicRate

        public double getTopicRate(Long topicId)
        This method returns the rate of the topic
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic id
        Returns:
        returns the rate of the topic. Between 1-5.

      • getTopicUserRate

        public int getTopicUserRate(Long topicId)
        This method returns the rate of the user on a topic.
        Parameters:
        topicId - the topic
        Returns:
        returns the rate of the user to the topic. between 1-5.
